nodes.bodyText: I think it works without the diamond operator too and gets cast to the generics implicitly. Can't we use that instead?
^That will throw rawType checkstyle error IIRC
Ah ok, I tried it in sdk which does not have checkstyle in place
Yea, that'd be a raw type; raw types cause a compiler warning usually. But we have javac warnings as errors in this project now.
